languages.text: {n}Экран несколько раз мигает прежде, чем явить миру текст на низком готике:{/n} "Именем основателя станции Футфол, покорителя звезд, строителя форпостов, благороднейшего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Парсимуса Девейна, а также от всех его потомков, приветствую тебя, гость! Сей когитатор установлен по приказу сиятельного Парсимуса, дабы могли страждущие прикоснуться к потоку его мудрости. Обрати взор к перечню разделов, выбери, что желаешь узнать!"

{n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"
languages.original_text: {n}Экран несколько раз мигает прежде, чем явить миру текст на низком готике:{/n} "Именем основателя станции Футфол, покорителя звезд, строителя форпостов, благороднейшего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Парсимуса Девейна, а также от всех его потомков, приветствую тебя, гость! Сей когитатор установлен по приказу сиятельного Парсимуса, дабы могли страждущие прикоснуться к потоку его мудрости. Обрати взор к перечню разделов, выбери, что желаешь узнать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The screen a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic,{/n} "In the name of the founder of the Footfall station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest Rogue Trader Parsimus Dewain and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you, guest! This cogitator was installed at the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Lay your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

languages.text: {n}画面は何度か点滅を繰り返し、下位帝国語で書かれた文章を映し出した。{/n}「フットフォール・ステーションの創設者、星々の支配者、前哨基地の建設者、もっとも高貴な{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であるパルシムス・ドウェインの名において、そして彼のすべての子孫を代表して歓迎する！この考算機は輝かしいパルシムスの命令で設置されたもので、必要とする人が自由に彼の叡智に触れることができるように設計されている。各項目の一覧に目を通し、知りたい内容を選択してください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}画面は何度か点滅を繰り返し、下位帝国語で書かれた文章を映し出した。{/n}「フットフォール・ステーションの創設者、星々の支配者、前哨基地の建設者、もっとも高貴な{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であるパルシムス・ドウェインの名において、そして彼のすべての子孫を代表して歓迎する！この考算機は輝かしいパルシムスの命令で設置されたもので、必要とする人が自由に彼の叡智に触れることができるように設計されている。各項目の一覧に目を通し、知りたい内容を選択してください！」

languages.text: {n}屏幕闪烁了几次，随后展示了一段低哥特语文字。{/n}“以落脚港的创造者，群星的征服者，哨站的建造者，最高贵的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}帕西姆斯·德维恩的名义，并代表他的所有后代，我欢迎你！这台沉思者是遵从杰出的帕西姆斯的命令安装的，以便有需要之人踏入他的智慧之流中。好了，把注意力放在这张列表上，选择你想知道的事项吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}屏幕闪烁了几次，随后展示了一段低哥特语文字。{/n}“以落脚港的创造者，群星的征服者，哨站的建造者，最高贵的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}帕西姆斯·德维恩的名义，并代表他的所有后代，我欢迎你！这台思考器是遵从杰出的帕西姆斯的命令安装的，以便有需要之人踏入他的智慧之流中。好了，把注意力放在这张列表上，选择你想知道的事项吧！”

languages.text: {n}La pantalla parpadea varias veces antes de mostrar un texto en Bajo Gótico:{/n} «En nombre del fundador de la estación de Paso, conquistador de estrellas, constructor de puestos avanzados, el insigne {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} Parsimus Dewain, y en nombre de sus descendientes, ¡te doy la bienvenida! Este cogitador fue instalado por orden del ilustre Parsimus para que los necesitados puedan beber de su sabiduría. ¡Contempla la lista de secciones y elige lo que quieras saber!».
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La pantalla parpadea varias veces antes de mostrar un texto en Bajo Gótico:{/n} «En nombre del fundador de la estación de Paso, conquistador de estrellas, constructor de puestos avanzados, el insigne {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} Parsimus Dewain, y en nombre de sus descendientes, ¡te doy la bienvenida! Este cogitador fue instalado por orden del ilustre Parsimus para que los necesitados puedan beber de su sabiduría. ¡Contempla la lista de secciones y elige lo que quieras saber!».

languages.text: {n}L'écran clignote à plusieurs reprises avant d'afficher un texte en bas gothique :{/n} « Au nom de Parsimus Dewain, noble {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}, fondateur de la station Castel, conquérant des étoiles et bâtisseur d'avant-postes, ainsi qu'au nom de tous ses descendants, je vous souhaite la bienvenue ! Ce cogitateur a été installé sur les ordres de l'illustre Parsimus, afin que chaque personne en ressentant le besoin puisse profiter de sa sagesse. Parcourez la liste des sections et sélectionnez le sujet avec lequel vous souhaitez vous familiariser ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'écran clignote à plusieurs reprises avant d'afficher un texte en bas gothique :{/n} « Au nom de Parsimus Dewain, noble {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}, fondateur de la station Castel, conquérant des étoiles et bâtisseur d'avant-postes, ainsi qu'au nom de tous ses descendants, je vous souhaite la bienvenue ! Ce cogitateur a été installé sur les ordres de l'illustre Parsimus, afin que chaque personne en ressentant le besoin puisse profiter de sa sagesse. Parcourez la liste des sections et sélectionnez le sujet avec lequel vous souhaitez vous familiariser ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Bildschirm flackert einige Male und zeigt dann der Welt einen Text auf Niedergotisch an:{/n} "Im Namen von Parsimus Dewain, Gründer der Footfall-Station, Eroberer der Sterne, Baumeister von Außenposten und edelster {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, sowie im Namen all seiner Nachkommen heiße ich Euch willkommen! Dieser Cogitator wurde auf Befehl des erlauchten Parsimus aufgestellt, damit alle am Fluss seiner Weisheit teilhaben können. Lenkt Euren Blick auf die Liste der Überschriften und wählt aus, was Ihr wissen möchtet!"
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bildschirm flackert einige Male und zeigt dann der Welt einen Text auf Niedergotisch an:{/n} "Im Namen von Parsimus Dewain, Gründer der Footfall-Station, Eroberer der Sterne, Baumeister von Außenposten und edelster {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, sowie im Namen all seiner Nachkommen heiße ich Euch willkommen! Dieser Cogitator wurde auf Befehl des erlauchten Parsimus aufgestellt, damit alle am Fluss seiner Weisheit teilhaben können. Lenkt Euren Blick auf die Liste der Überschriften und wählt aus, was Ihr wissen möchtet!"

languages.text: {n}Ekran birkaç kez yanıp sönüyor, ardından Adi Gotik bir metin ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Binliman İstasyonu'nun babası, yıldızların fatihi, karakolların kurucusu, pek asil {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} Parsimus Dewain ve onun soyundan gelen herkes adına size hoş geldiniz diyorum! Bu kavramsayar şanlı Parsimus'un emriyle, onun irfan pınarına muhtaç herkesin kana kana içmesi için kurulmuştur. Bölüm listesine göz gezdirin ve bilgi almak istediğiniz konuyu seçin!"
languages.original_text: {n}The screen flickers a few times before revealing to the world a text in Low Gothic:{/n} "In the name of the founder of Footfall Station, conqueror of stars, builder of outposts, the noblest {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} Parsimus Dewain, and on behalf of all his descendants, I welcome you! This cogitator was installed on the order of the illustrious Parsimus so that the needy may tap into the flow of his wisdom. Cast your eyes upon the list of sections and choose what you wish to know!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ekran birkaç kez daha yanıp sönüyor, ardından Adi Gotik bir metin ortaya çıkıyor:{/n} "Binliman İstasyonu'nın babası, yıldızların fatihi, karakollarının kurucusu, en soylu {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} Parsimus Dewain ve onun soyundan gelen herkes adına size hoş geldiniz diyorum! Bu kavramsayar değerli Parsimus tarafından, irfanına ihtiyaç duyan herkesin başvurması için kurulmuştur. Bölüm listesine göz gezdirin ve öğrenmek istediğiniz konuyu seçin!"
